flawed_nl_solution:
To move in, Janet had to pay 2 months worth of rent so that would cost 2*1250 = $<<2*1250=5200>>5200
On top of the rent she needed to pay a deposit of $500 so 5200+500 = $<<5200+500=5700>>5700 total to rent the apartment
If it cost $5700 to move in and she had $2225 then she need 5700-2225 = $<<5700-2225=3475>>3475 more
#### 3475

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2500, not 5200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
